sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import {CheckoutPageContainer,CheckoutHeaderContainer,CheckoutBlockContainer,TotalContainer,ButtonContainer,TestWarningContainerContainer} from './checkout.styles' const CheckoutPage = ({cartItems, total}) =>( Product Description Quantity Price Remove { cartItems.map(cartItem=> ) } TOTAL: ${total} *Please use the following test credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 01/21 - CVV:123 ) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
